summary: AN ORDINANCE concerning the regulation of lobbying; establishing certain duties, registration and reporting requirements, restrictions and penalties; setting forth powers and duties of the Ethics and Elections Commission and the Executive Director thereof; setting forth procedures relating to complaints and investigations concerning alleged violations; adding a new Chapter 2.06; amending certain sections of Chapter 2.04; and amending Section 3.70.100 of the Seattle Municipal Code.
sponsor: LICATA, CO-SPONSORS: BURGESS, CONLIN, GODDEN, RASMUSSEN
